name: Minute Bouncer
description:
Minute Bouncer

Drag the mouse to create a trampoline for your little blob friend.

Collect coins, last long and travel far to increase the three highscores!

But beware the evil mines, they will end your run immediately, as will falling to your doom.

But of course, you can go again and try to increase your scores.

The sky (and the 60 second timer) is the limit, so bounce and have fun!

Screen size is 450 x 900 in a desktop, but fullscreen support in a mobile browser!

Created for the one minute jam #6

Programmed in p5 javascript using matter.js and p5 play.

Sprite assets taken from

  • the kenney pixelplatformer: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer
  • the kenney splatpack: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/splat-pack

Font is https://www.1001freefonts.com/bullpen-3d.font

All sounds and music by me using SFXR and Ableton Live.
